title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR GENERATING MASKS TO IMPROVE THE ROBUSTNESS OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE NETWORKS
abstract: 본 발명은 인공지능 네트워크 강인성 향상을 위한 마스크 생성 방법 및 장치에 관한 것이다. 본 발명에 따른 마스크 생성 방법은, 마스크 생성 장치에 의해 수행된다. 상기 마스크 생성 방법은, 학습 데이터를 n개의 데이터셋으로 분할하고, 상기 n개의 데이터셋을 이용하여 n개의 인공지능 네트워크를 학습시키는 단계와, 학습된 상기 n개의 인공지능 네트워크에 포함된 분류기의 가중치를 조합하여 마스크를 생성하는 단계와, 상기 마스크와 상기 분류기의 가중치 간의 원소 곱(element-wise multiplication) 연산을 통해 상기 분류기의 가중치를 업데이트하는 단계를 포함한다.

title: SECURITY AUTHENTICATION SOLUTION SYSTEM IN NETWORK ENVIRONMENT USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: 인공지능을 이용한 네트워크 환경에서의 보안인증 솔루션 시스템이 개시된다. 본 발명에 따른 인공지능을 이용한 네트워크 환경에서의 보안인증 솔루션 시스템은, 사용자의 생체 신호를 감지하고 측정하는 휴대 장치인 PHD(Personal Healthcare Device)가 오브젝트로 활용되는 IoT 시스템이며, IoT 시스템을 이용한 사용자 원격 모니터링을 위해, 인공지능을 이용하여 상기 PHD로부터 수신되는 사용자의 헬스케어 데이터를 포함하는 개인 정보의 데이터 보안을 위한 네트워크 환경에서의 보안인증 솔루션 시스템에 있어서, PHD로부터 사용자의 개인 정보를 수신하고, 개인 정보를 분산하여 저장하는 네트워크 서버; 및 네트워크 서버로부터 개인 정보의 분산에 관련된 분산 정보를 수신하여 저장하는 인증 서버;를 포함한다.

title: Artificial intelligence-based switchboard fire prevention detection system
abstract: 본 발명은 인공지능 기반의 수배전반 화재 예방 감지 시스템에 관한 것으로서, 각종 전기설비를 내장한 배전반 본체와, 상기 배전반 본체의 하부에 일정한 간격을 갖고 배열되는 내진 유닛과, 상기 배전반 본체 내부의 온도 및 연기를 검출하여 화재를 감지하는 화재 감지부와, 상기 배전반 본체 내부의 먼지 농도를 감지하는 먼지 감지부와, 상기 내진 유닛과 연결되어 상기 배전반 본체의 진동을 감지하는 진동 감지부와, 상기 배전반 내부에 내장된 전기 설비의 전압 및 전류를 포함하여 고조파 신호를 측정하는 전력품질 감지부와, 상기 화재 감지부, 먼지 감지부, 진동 감지부로부터 감지된 정보와 함께 전력품질 감지부에서 측정된 정보를 외부로 전달하는 무선 통신부와, 상기 무선 통신부를 통해 전달된 정보를 전달받아 저장하고 저장된 정보를 다중 회귀분석 및 LSTM 모델을 이용하여 예측 모델의 수립하고 인공지능 알고리즘(Al)을 이용하여 화재를 진단 및 예측하는 데이터 분석부와, 상기 무선 통신부를 통해 전달된 전압, 전류, 고조파 신호를 근거로 고조파 왜형율과 전압 불평형률을 분석하여 전력품질을 분석하는 전력품질 분석부와, 상기 데이터 분석부를 통해 분석된 화재 예측 정보를 포함하여 상기 전력품질 분석부에서 분석된 전력품질을 근거로 상기 배전반 본체 내부에 설치된 부품 및 선로 상태, 전력 품질을 데이터화하여 모니터링하는 모니터링부를 포함하여 이루어진 것을 특징으로 한다.

title: Method for Controlling Ground-mounted Traffic Lights Using Artificial Intelligence and Management Server Used Therefor
abstract: 인공 지능을 이용한 바닥 설치형 신호등의 제어 방법 및 이에 사용되는 관리 서버가 개시된다. 본 발명은 관리 서버가, 발광 장치에 구비된 발광 모듈의 상태 정보를 분석하고, 발광 모듈의 상태 정보 분석 결과에 기초하여 발광 모듈 제어 신호를 생성하며, 발광 모듈 제어 신호를 발광 장치를 제어하는 제어 장치로 송신하는 과정을 통해 구현된다. 본 발명에 따르면, 발광 장치의 의도된 동작을 위해 복수의 발광 모듈 중 특정 발광 모듈과 연결된 공급선을 통해 전류가 공급되는 경우에 해당 공급선을 제외한 나머지 공급선을 통한 전류 공급이 근본적으로 차단됨으로써 발광 장치의 오작동을 매우 효과적으로 방지할 수 있게 된다.

title: METHOD FOR PROVIDING SOLUTIONS FOR ASSESSING AND IMPROVING PHYSICAL FUNCTION USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: 일실시예에 따른 장치는 사용자의 단말로부터 사용자의 기본 정보를 획득하고, 사용자의 단말로부터 사용자의 통증 정보를 획득하고, 신체 평가 단말로부터 통증 부위 및 연계 부위에 대한 신체 기능 평가 데이터를 획득하고, 사용자의 기본 정보, 사용자의 통증 정보, 통증 부위 및 연계 부위에 대한 신체 기능 평가 데이터를 인공지능 모델에 적용하여, 신체 기능 개선 솔루션을 확인하고, 확인된 신체 기능 개선 솔루션을 사용자의 단말로 제공한다.

title: METHOD DEVICE AND SYSTEM FOR GETTING RID OF BIRDS IN FISH FARM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODEL
abstract: 일실시예에 따르면, 제어 장치에 의해 수행되는, 인공지능 모델 기반 양식장 내 조류 퇴치 방법에 있어서, 양식장의 일측면에 설치되어 있는 제1 센서로부터, 상기 양식장의 내부인 제1 방향을 감지하여 생성된 제1 감지 정보를 수신하는 단계; 상기 제1 감지 정보를 기초로, 상기 제1 방향에 객체가 있는지에 대한 모니터링을 수행하는 단계; 상기 모니터링을 수행한 결과, 상기 제1 방향에 제1 객체가 있는 것으로 확인되면, 상기 제1 감지 정보를 기반으로, 제1 입력 신호를 생성하는 단계; 감지 정보의 분석으로 객체가 조류일 확률을 예측하도록 학습된 제1 인공지능 모델에 상기 제1 입력 신호를 입력하는 단계; 상기 제1 입력 신호의 입력을 통해 상기 제1 객체가 조류일 확률이 제1 확률로 예측되면, 상기 제1 인공지능 모델로부터 상기 제1 확률을 지시하는 제1 출력 신호를 획득하는 단계; 상기 제1 출력 신호를 기초로, 상기 제1 객체가 조류일 확률이 상기 제1 확률인 것으로 확인하는 단계; 상기 제1 확률이 미리 설정된 기준 확률 보다 높은 것으로 확인되면, 상기 제1 방향에 있는 것으로 확인된 상기 제1 객체의 수를 제1 객체 수로 확인하는 단계; 및 상기 제1 객체 수가 미리 설정된 기준값 보다 많은 것으로 확인되면, 상기 제1 방향의 조류 퇴치를 담당하고 있는 제1 퇴치 도구가 작동하도록 제어하는 단계를 포함하는, 인공지능 모델 기반 양식장 내 조류 퇴치 방법이 제공된다.

title: UI METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PERFORMING AUTOMATIC ACTION THROUGH UI VISUAL RECOGNITION AND RESOLUTION COORDINATE MATCHING IN WEB AND PROGRAM ENVIRONMENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: 본 발명의 실시예에 따르면, 사용자 인터페이스를 포함하는 영상을 획득하는 영상 획득부; 상기 영상에 포함된 사용자 인터페이스의 각 구성요소를 인식하여 분리하는 영상 분석부; 상기 각 구성요소별 행위를 추론하여 매칭시키는 행동 추론부; 및 실제 행위 정보를 상기 사용자 인터페이스에 전송하는 행동 수행부를 포함하는, 자동 액션 수행 시스템이 제공된다.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD OF PROVIDING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED RESPIRATORY SYSTEM SUCTION GUIDE
abstract: 인공지능 기반 호흡기계 흡인 가이드 제공 시스템 및 방법이 개시된다. 본 개시의 다양한 실시예들 중 적어도 하나에 따른 인공지능 기반 호흡기계 흡인 가이드 제공 시스템은, 객담을 흡인하는 호흡기계 흡인 장치; 및 사용자의 신체 일부에 대한 영상 데이터를 획득하여, 인공지능 기반으로 상기 영상 데이터 내 객담에 대한 정보를 추출하고, 상기 객담에 대한 정보에 기초하여 상기 호흡기계 흡인 장치를 제어하여 상기 객담을 흡인하도록 가이드 정보를 제공하는 호흡기계 흡인 가이드 장치를 포함할 수 있다.

title: Method apparatus and computer program for system event processing using generative artificial intelligence
abstract: 본 발명은 생성형 인공지능을 활용한 시스템 이벤트 처리 방법, 장치 및 컴퓨터 프로그램에 관한 것으로서, 본 발명의 장치의 프로세서에 의해 수행되는 이벤트 처리 방법은, 발생된 이벤트에 대해 구분된 질의 영역에서의 이벤트 유형에 상응하는 대상 LLM을 선정하는 단계, 및 선정된 상기 대상 LLM에 질의하여 획득한 답변에 대해 채택 여부 정보에 따라 재차 상기 대상 LLM의 선정과 선정된 상기 대상 LLM에 질의하기 위한 재호출 여부를 결정하는 단계를 포함할 수 있다.

title: APPLICATION DE CAMÉRA À OBTURATEUR À SÉLECTION MULTIPLE QUI ENVOIE SÉLECTIVEMENT DES IMAGES À DIFFÉRENTES PLATEFORMES D'INTELLIGENCE ARTIFICIELLE
abstract: The invention relates to a multi-select shutter camera application and a method that selectively allows content to be sent for quick sharing and information purposes. An electronic device having a screen (410) incorporating a touch surface (411) and a processor is used. The screen (410) includes a multi-shutter view comprising at least one content block (120) and at least two selective capture buttons (110). When a user selection of a selective capture button triggers an AI platform to analyse the content via parameters (such as geolocation, capture time, photo content) and generate a plurality of alternatives and options associated with the selected capture button. Different options may include: discovery functionality alternatives including applications, contacts, and/or multimedia content; purchase functionality alternatives including websites, applications, contacts, multimedia content, and/or information; and sharing functionality alternatives including combinations and alternatives for easily sharing content with other users and/or social media platforms. Linvention concerne une application de caméra à obturateur multi-sélection et un procédé qui permettent sélectivement d'envoyer un contenu à des fins de partage et d'information rapides. Un dispositif électronique ayant un écran (410) incorporant une surface tactile (411) et un processeur sont utilisés. L'écran (410) comprend une vue multi-obturateur comprenant au moins un bloc de contenu (120) et au moins deux boutons de capture sélectifs (110). Lorsqu'une sélection d'utilisateur d'un bouton de capture sélectif déclenche une plateforme d'IA pour analyser le contenu par l'intermédiaire de paramètres (tels que la géolocalisation, le temps de capture, le contenu de la photo) et générer une pluralité d'alternatives et d'options associées au bouton de capture sélectionné. Différentes options peuvent comprendre : Des alternatives de fonctionnalité de découverte comprenant des applications, des contacts et/ou un contenu multimédia ; des alternatives de fonctionnalité d'achat comprenant des sites Web, des applications, des contacts, un contenu multimédia et/ou des informations ; et le partage d'alternatives de fonctionnalité comprenant des combinaisons et des alternatives pour partager facilement un contenu avec d'autres utilisateurs et/ou plateformes de média social.

title: Système et méthode de prévision et d'optimisation de rendement agricole par Intelligence Artificielle
abstract: The present invention describes an integrated agricultural data analysis system using artificial intelligence to optimise greenhouse crop management. The system includes image capture devices, an AI module for data analysis, including yield estimation and maturity prediction, cloud storage, an interactive user interface, and a logistics management module. The associated method involves two phases: data preparation and training, followed by real-time analysis and prediction, enabling accurate resource and transport planning and logistics management, thereby promoting sustainable and economical agriculture. La présente invention décrit un système intégré d'analyse de données agricoles utilisant l'intelligence artificielle pour optimiser la gestion des cultures en serre. Le système inclut des dispositifs de capture d'images, un module d'IA pour l'analyse des données, y compris l'estimation de rendement et la prédiction de maturité, un stockage en cloud, une interface utilisateur interactive et un module de gestion logistique. La méthode associée comporte deux phases : la préparation et l'entraînement des données, suivies par l'analyse et la prédiction en temps réel, permettant une planification et gestion logistique précise des ressources et des transports, favorisant ainsi une agriculture durable et économique.

title: PROCÉDÉ ET APPLICATION DE PARTAGE RAPIDE D'IMAGES ENTRE DES DISPOSITIFS ÉLECTRONIQUES MOBILES À L'AIDE D'UNE PLATEFORME INNOVANTE ET D'UNE INTELLIGENCE ARTIFICIELLE
abstract: The invention relates to a method and system for quickly sharing content using artificial intelligence (‘AI). An electronic device having a display device (101), a touch screen, and a processor is used. Multimedia content, such as an image, is captured using the device's camera (201) or screen capture feature. Using an AI system, the captured image is analysed and, based on previous communications and patterns, appropriate recipients, communication channels and/or platforms are identified for the user to share the multimedia content. A sharing screen (330) having a plurality of selectable areas (205) is displayed. The selectable areas are associated with different communication channel(s) and audience(s), including a recipient and an associated communication channel (selected from text, email, or mobile application communication channels) or a social media platform (20) of the user. Upon selection of the selectable areas, a message comprising the multimedia content (200) is created and transmitted by the device. Linvention concerne un procédé et un système qui partagent rapidement un contenu à l'aide d'une intelligence artificielle (« IA »). Un dispositif électronique ayant un dispositif d'affichage (101), un écran tactile et un processeur est utilisé. Un contenu multimédia, tel qu'une image, est capturé à l'aide de la caméra (201) ou de la fonctionnalité de capture d'écran du dispositif. À l'aide d'un système IA, l'image capturée est analysée et, sur la base de communications et de motifs antérieurs, des destinataires appropriés, des canaux de communication et/ou des plateformes sont identifiés pour le partage du contenu multimédia par l'utilisateur. Un écran de partage (330) ayant une pluralité de zones sélectionnables (205) est affiché. Les zones sélectionnables sont associées à un canal/des canaux de communication et public(s) différent(s), comprenant un destinataire et un canal de communication associé (sélectionné parmi un texte, un courrier électronique ou des canaux de communication d'application mobile) ou une plateforme de médias sociaux (20) de l'utilisateur. Lors de la sélection des zones sélectionnables, un message comprenant le contenu multimédia (200) est créé et transmis par le dispositif.

title: SYSTEM FOR INSPECTING THE QUALITY OF TYRES BASED ON AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODEL
applicants: CONTINENTAL AUTOMOTIVE GUADALAJARA MEXICO S DE R L DE C V [MX]
CONTINENTAL AUTOMOTIVE GUADALAJARA MEXICO, S. DE R.L. DE C.V
abstract: The present invention relates to a system and method for evaluating the physical state of tyres during their manufacturing process or from tyres to be recycled in order to determine whether there are defects that may be detrimental to the performance of said tyres. To this end, use is made of a shearography camera which captures images of the tyres and a convolutional neural network model which is capable of determining from the images captured by the shearography camera if there are damage in the tyres and if said damage is relevant to the performance of the tyres. La presente invención se refiere a un sistema y método para evaluar el estado físico de neumáticos durante su proceso de fabricación o de neumáticos que serán reciclados con el fin de determinar si existen defectos que puedan ser perjudiciales para el desempeño de dichos neumáticos. Para ello, se hace uso de una cámara para shearografía que capture imágenes de los neumáticos y un modelo de red neuronal convolucional que sea capaz de determinar a partir de las imágenes capturadas por la cámara para shearografía si existen daños en los neumáticos y si dichos daños son relevantes para el desempeño de los neumáticos.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REAL-TIME COMMUNICATION BETWEEN MOBILE DEVICES AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS VIA WEBSOCKETS
abstract: The invention is a system and method that uses artificial intelligence (AI) techniques on remote servers to process samples and receive results on mobile devices in real-time via a WebSocket connection, via a mobile application. The latter sends the optimized and coded sample to the server, which decodes and processes it within the AI model. The model returns a result to the user, which is displayed on an interactive screen of the application to serve as an aid in decision making based on the result, offering suggestions and providing a list of experts in the area. The process can be repeated indefinitely thanks to Websockets technology. La invención es un sistema y método que utiliza técnicas de inteligencia artificial (IA) en servidores remotos para procesar muestras y recibir resultados en dispositivos móviles en tiempo real mediante una conexión WebSocket, por medio de una aplicación móvil. Está ultima envía la muestra optimizada y codificada al servidor, el cual la descodifica y procesa dentro del modelo de IA. El modelo devuelve un resultado al usuario, el cual se muestra en una pantalla interactiva de la aplicación para servir como ayuda en la toma de decisiones en base al resultado, ofreciendo sugerencias y proporcionando una lista de expertos en el área. El proceso puede repetirse indefinidamente gracias a la tecnología de Websockets.

title: A System for Supporting a Personal Safety and a Sailing Safety Based on an Artificial Intelligence and a Supporting Method with the Same
abstract: 본 발명은 인공지능 기반 해상 인명 안전 및 운항 안전 지원 시스템 및 그에 의한 지원 방법에 관한 것이다. 인공지능 기반 해상 인명 안전 및 운항 안전 지원 시스템은 선박 내부 또는 선박 외부의 미리 정해진 영역의 영상을 연속적으로 획득하는 영상 획득 모듈(11); 영상 획득 모듈(11)에 의하여 획득된 영상 데이터로부터 감시 객체를 추출하고, 추출된 감시 객체를 분석하여 위험 상황을 판단하는 신호 처리 모듈(12); 신호 처리 모듈(12)에서 판단된 위험 상황을 외부에 표시하는 영상 전시 모듈(13); 및 위험 상황을 선박 안전 관련 기관에 무선 통신을 통하여 전송하는 통신 모듈(14)을 포함한다.

title: Sharing my wardrobe by classifying clothes and building virtual wardrobes using artificial intelligence
abstract: 본 발명은 인공지능을 활용한 의류 분류 및 가상 옷장 구축을 통한 내 옷장 공유에 관한 것으로서 의류라벨 인식에 의하여 의류라벨을 찍어서 옷을 분류 할 수 있게 하고, 의류항목 분류에 의하여 데이터베이스에 저장된 의류를 상의,하의,아우터,신발, 악세사리등 각 항목에 알맞은 카테고리로 분류할 수 있게 함으로써 비슷한 의류끼리는 분류가 어려운, 의류를 분류하지만 가시화가 쉽지 않은, 사이즈만 분류 할 뿐 특정한 옷 확정이 어려운 문제점을 해소하도록 함으로써 기존의 비슷한 의류끼리는 분류가 어려운, 의류를 분류하지만 가시화가 쉽지 않은, 사이즈만 분류 할 뿐 특정한 옷 확정이 어려운 문제점을 해소 하도록 한 것이다.즉 본 발명은, 인공지능 기반의 의류의 유형 분류 및 사이즈 측정 장치 및 방법에 있어서 의류라벨을 찍어서 옷을 분류 할 수 있게 의류라벨을 해당 의류라벨에 알맞은 옷을 인식하여 인식한 이미지를 데이터베이스에 저장한 의류라벨 인식, 데이터베이스에 저장된 의류를 상의,하의,아우터,신발, 악세사리등 각 항목에 알맞은 카테고리로 분류할 수 있게 구글에 있는 데이터베이스를 기반으로 라벨에 있는 의류 번호에 알맞은 의류를 인식하고 상의,하의,신발,아우터 등으로 CNN방법을 활용한 AI학습을 통해서 항목을 분류한 의류항목 분류, 의류항목 분류를 통해서 가상의 옷장속에 의류를 분류하여 나의 가상 옷장을 완성 할 수 있게 구성번호 2에서 분류한 의류 카테고리별로 가상옷장속에 알맞은 카테고리를 설정하여 내 옷을 활용한 나의 가상옷장을 구현한 가상 옷장 구축, 구성번호 3에서 구축한 가상 옷장을 커뮤니티 유저들과 내 옷장을 공유 할 수 있게 구성번호 3에서 구축한 가상의 옷장을 서버 데이터베이스에 구축하여 각 고객별로 데이터를 저장하여 각자의 옷장을 유저과 공유한 가상 옷장 공유로 구성한 것이다.따라서, 본 발명은 의류라벨 인식에 의하여 의류라벨을 찍어서 옷을 분류 할 수 있게 하고, 의류항목 분류에 의하여 데이터베이스에 저장된 의류를 상의,하의,아우터,신발, 악세사리등 각 항목에 알맞은 카테고리로 분류할 수 있게 함으로써 비슷한 의류끼리는 분류가 어려운, 의류를 분류하지만 가시화가 쉽지 않은, 사이즈만 분류 할 뿐 특정한 옷 확정이 어려운 문제점을 해소하도록 함으로써 기존의 비슷한 의류끼리는 분류가 어려운, 의류를 분류하지만 가시화가 쉽지 않은, 사이즈만 분류 할 뿐 특정한 옷 확정이 어려운 문제점을 해소하도록 한 효과를 갖는 것이다.

title: SALES ADMINISTRATION SYSTEM WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: 본 발명에 따른 인공지능 기술을 이용한 영업 관리 시스템은 이용자가 데이터를 입출력하기 위한 이용자단말부와, 상기 이용자단말부에 의해 입력된 데이터를 저장하기 위한 시스템서버부와, 상기 시스템서버부에 저장되는 영업관리프로그램을 포함하며, 상기 영업관리프로그램은 영업 대상 고객에 관한 식별데이터를 저장하기 위한 고객관리부와, 영업 대상 고객 관리를 위한 영업관리부와, 영업 대상 상품에 대한 견적서를 형성하기 위한 견적서형성부와, 상기 영업관리프로그램을 관리하기 위한 인공지능모듈을 포함하고, 상기 영업관리부는 영업 대상 고객의 구매내역을 저장하기 위한 구매내역저장부와, 영업 대상 고객의 구매상품을 저장하기 위한 구매상품저장부와, 영업 대상 고객에 대한 영업방법을 저장하기 위한 영업방법저장부를 포함하며, 상기 영업관리부에 마련되는 미리 지정된 버튼을 선택하는 경우, 상기 영업 대상 고객에서 제공하는 웹사이트 서버로부터 데이터를 다운로드 받아 상기 고객관리부와 구매내역저장부와 구매상품저장부에 데이터를 저장하도록 구성되는 것을 특징으로 한다. 본 발명에 의해, 영업관리의 효율을 높여 영업 준비에 소요되는 시간을 감축할 수 있다. 또한, 영업 노하우를 시스템적으로 관리함으로써, 담당자 변경의 경우에도 업무의 연속성을 확보하여 영업 역량의 평균치를 높일 수 있으며, 영업 실패 요인의 반복을 방지하고, 성공률을 높일 수 있다.

title: SYSTEM FOR DETECTING VIDEO ANOMALY BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: 본 발명은 인공지능 모델 기반의 비디오 이상 검출 시스템에 관한 것이다. 인공지능 모델 기반의 비디오 이상 검출 시스템은, 정상 비디오 데이터를 변환하여 학습 비디오 데이터를 생성하는 패치 이상 생성 모듈, 패치 이상 생성 모듈에 의해 생성된 학습 비디오 데이터를 기초로 예측 비디오 데이터를 생성하는 인공지능 모델 및 인공지능 모델에 의해 생성된 예측 비디오 데이터를 이용하여 학습 비디오 데이터의 이상 여부를 검출하는 이상 검출 모듈을 포함한다.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR UTILIZING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO GUIDE A MEDICAL DEVICE
abstract: Systems and methods for generating navigational guidance for a medical device within a body are disclosed. One computer-implemented method may include: receiving, at a computer server, image data associated with at least one anatomical object; determining, using a processor associated with the computer server and via application of a trained predictive navigational guidance model to the image data, navigational guidance for the medical device in relation to the at least one anatomical object; generating, based on the determining, at least one visual representation associated with the navigational guidance; and transmitting, to a user device in network communication with the computer server, instructions to display the at least one visual representation associated with the navigational guidance overtop of the image data on a display screen of the user device.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED PERSONALIZED CARE DELIVERY SYSTEMS AND METHODS
abstract: A personalized health plan (PHP) computing system is described. The PHP computing system is configured to receive member health data associated with a member and apply the member health data to an observation model trained to identify health conditions of the member based upon historical health data. The PHP computing system is also configured to receive a health conditions output from the observation model and apply the health conditions output to one or more service models wherein the one or more service models are trained to generate treatment plans associated with care for different health conditions. The PHP computing system is further configured to receive a service response output from the service model, cause a first notification for a recommended health appointment to be transmitted to a care provider computing device, and cause a second notification for the recommended health appointment to be transmitted to a member computing device.

title: ORIENTAL MEDICINE DIAGNOSIS AND PRESCRIPTION SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND OPERATION METHOD THEREOF
abstract: Disclosed is a herbal medicine diagnosis and prescription system which utilizes a deep learning model learned by using at least one of the information on oriental medicine formulations mapped to symptoms constituting the disclosed proof of evidence and information on personality types mapped to constitutional types comprises an artificial neural network based on a deep learning model which extracts the first and the second feature vectors from a user's questionnaire response data, receives the feature vectors as an input layer to extract at least one candidate oriental medicine formulation, sorts the extracted candidate oriental medicine formulations according to prescription priorities, or receives the second feature vector as an input layer to determine at least one health constitution type, and outputs health information mapped with the determined health constitution type. vacuum insulator layer laminated on the hot melt layer.

title: CONVERSATIONAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM FOR MEDIA DEVICES
abstract: System, apparatus, article of manufacture, method and/or computer program embodiments are provided for using an artificial intelligence system to interact with a device. An example method can include obtaining a transcript of a voice input requesting a task from a media device and recognized using automatic speech recognition; based on the transcript and auxiliary data, generating an input to a neural network, the auxiliary data including context data and/or historical data associated with previous voice interactions with the media device; based on the input, determining, by the neural network, a response to the voice input; generating, by the neural network, an output based on the response; converting the output from the neural network into an executable command configured to trigger the media device to perform an action associated with the response to the voice input; and based on the command, triggering the media device to perform the action.

title: VIDEO BLENDING DEVICE UTILIZING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: A video blending device connected to an electronic gaming machine and a player tracking system determines whether to display player tracking content. If so, it captures game images and sends them with a prompt to a large language model (LLM), the prompt configured to determine if a game is active. If not, the video blending device displays the player tracking content. The video blending device also uses prompts to the LLM to determine game button locations and appearances and to generate a new, similar-looking player tracking button, which is then displayed in an appropriate location.

title: IMMERSIVE ANIMATED CONTENT FROM STATIC IMAGES USING GENERATIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: Approaches presented herein may be used to generate animated images using two-dimensional (2D) static images. An input image may be used to generate a first image corresponding to a foreground of the input image and at least a second image corresponding to a background of the input image. The second image may include an inpainted region based on a mask generated from the first image. The first and second images may be provided with configuration settings for rendering on a client device.

title: Audio Data Selection for Video Matching Using Generative Artificial Intelligence Model
abstract: A video editing system leverages a generative artificial intelligence (AI) model to identify songs to overlay on a video. The video editing system extracts a set of key frames from the video and prompts the generative AI model to generate a video narrative for the video. A video narrative is a text description of the plot, theme, feel, or other characteristics of the video. The video editing system uses the video narrative to prompt the generative AI model again to generate a set of descriptor tags for the video based on the video narrative. Descriptor tags are strings that represent themes, features, or characteristics of the song. The video editing system uses an audio tagging system to score a set of songs based on the set of descriptor tags and presents a selected subset of the set of songs based on the scores of the songs.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR GENERATIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED IMAGE GENERATION
abstract: System and method for Generative Artificial Intelligence based image generation are disclosed. In an aspect, a user input is received requesting an image of a predetermined object to be generated. An enhanced prompt is then generated from the user input, the enhanced prompt includes one or more of a reference image of the predetermined object and a textual portion describing technical details for generating the image. Further, the enhanced prompt is input to an image generation model that preserves portions of the reference image including the predetermined object unchanged via masking the portions of the reference image, generates a depth map of the reference image, and generates an intermediate image by merging the reference image with the masked portions of the predetermined object and the depth map. Also, an enhanced version of the intermediate image is output as the image generated in response to the user input.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE(AI)-BASED SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR GENERATING AND EVALUATING RECONSTRUCTED MULTI-SPECTRAL IMAGES DEPICTING SKIN
abstract: Artificial intelligence-based systems and methods are described for generating and evaluating reconstructed multi-spectral images depicting skin. A digital image of a user is received at an imaging application (app) and comprises pixel data of at least a portion of a skin area of the user. A hyper-spectral (HS) reconstruction model, trained with pixel data of a plurality of digital images depicting human skin, outputs one or more reconstructed HS images, which can be used as input to one or more AI models. The imaging app generates, based on output from the one or more AI models, user-specific comparison data of the user, reconstructed HS images of the user, or mapping data of the user.

title: LANGUAGE MODEL-FACILITATED SELECTION OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SERVICES
abstract: In various examples, systems and techniques are provided that are directed to processing, using a language model, a user query associated with an artificial intelligence (AI) task. The system and techniques are used to obtain a recommendation to use, in performance of the AI task, one or more AI services—such as inference microservices—provided by, for example, a cloud AI server.

title: MEDICAL VOICE COMMERCE SYSTEM WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FOR HEALTHCARE INTEGRATION AND UNIVERSAL ACCESSIBILITY
abstract: The invention discloses a multilingual medical voice commerce system enabling secure, voice-activated transactions for healthcare products, services, and prescriptions. Utilizing AI-driven speech recognition optimized for medical terminology, the system integrates natural language processing and context-aware recommendation engines. Secure features include HIPAA-compliant authentication, patient consent management, and end-to-end encryption. The platform interfaces with electronic health records, pharmacy networks, insurance verification systems, and wearable health monitors for real-time medical data access and transaction execution. Designed for hospital procurement, surgical environments, telehealth, and home healthcare, the system incorporates universal accessibility, including adaptations for visual, motor, cognitive, and speech impairments. Multilingual capabilities ensure cultural and linguistic inclusivity. AI analytics track usage patterns, optimize recommendations, detect health trends, and support population health initiatives. Operable across smart speakers, medical devices, and connected platforms, the system delivers a unified, monetized, secure, and inclusive medical voice commerce ecosystem for patients, providers, and healthcare organizations worldwide.

title: ANALYZING AND IDENTIFYING AUDIO AND VIDEO CALLS GENERATED BY ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: An approach for validating the authenticity of digital content between digital devices may be provided. The approach registers a first user with a server and registering and storing an approved contact associated with the first user. The approach creates unique IDs (identification) for the first user and a second user from the approved contact and generating a security code for a first user pair, wherein the first user pair contains the first user and the second user. The approach creates an A/V watermark for the first user pair and verifies the security code of the first user pair. The approach validates authenticity of the A/V watermark during a communication session and displaying authentication status during the communication session.

title: GRAPH-BASED DATASET VALUATION TO SOLVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) PROBLEMS
abstract: Systems and methods are provided for leveraging data lineage information of datasets to estimate the merit (e.g., worth, value, or importance) of these datasets in performing a future task. For example, the dataset may have been historically applied to train an artificial intelligence (AI) model to perform a task (e.g., an artificial intelligence (AI) task like image recognition or object prediction/detection). The learned merit of the dataset in performing the task may be used as input to train a regressor model, and the trained regressor model can be used to predict future merit of the dataset characteristics in performing another task. The predicted future merit of the dataset characteristics can be mapped to the merit of the dataset in performing another task. The future merit may be related to the same dataset or a different dataset, based on the shared characteristics of the datasets.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) AGENT FRAMEWORK PERFORMING WORKFLOW ANALYTICS
abstract: A method and system of performing workflow analytics. The method includes implementing a first large language model (LLM) and creating a linked chain of LLMs via a model integration framework linking the first LLM with at least a second LLM. The method further includes implementing at least one analytical software tool from a tool registry such that each of the at least one analytical software tool is configured to perform a respective data analytics function, and implementing at least one software agent such that each is configured to perform at least one respective operational task. The method further includes generating an artificial intelligence (AI) agent framework by connecting the linked chain of LLMs with the at least one analytical software tool and the at least one software agent, and performing the workflow analytics via the AI agent framework.

title: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR VALIDATING DATABASE RECORDS BY APPLYING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO PRIORITIZE RECORDS FOR VALIDATION
abstract: Embodiments are directed to methods and systems for validating data in database records. More specifically, embodiments are directed to utilizing artificial intelligence to prioritize records for validation. For example, a reinforcement algorithm can be used to identify records with a high probability of containing erroneous data and prioritize these records for validation.

title: GENERATING APPLICATION PROGRAMMING INTERFACE (API) CALLS USING GENERATIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS
abstract: Certain aspects provide techniques and apparatus for invoking functions in a computing system using machine learning models. An example method generally includes receiving a request to execute an action in the computing system. Using a machine learning model, a plurality of application programming interface (API) call samples are generated for the received request. Based at least on keys in the plurality of API call samples and corresponding keys in API calls in a repository of API calls, a candidate API call for the received request is identified. A function associated with the candidate API call is invoked in response to the request.

title: Code Enhancement System and Method Using Artificial Intelligence
abstract: A method for enhancing software code includes sectioning, by one or more artificial intelligence (AI) sectioning tools, to produce one or more versions of AI sectioned code. The method further includes enhancing, by one or more AI code enhancing tools, the one or more versions of AI sectioned code to produce a plurality of versions of AI enhanced codes. The method further includes evaluating, by one or more AI evaluation tools, the plurality of versions of AI enhanced codes to produce one or more evaluated AI enhanced codes. The method further includes evaluating, by one or more trusted evaluation tools, the one or more evaluated AI enhanced codes to produce a final version of enhanced code.

title: VEHICLE INTERFACE USING GENERATIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: A computing system receives text from a vehicle and receives a vehicle state from the vehicle. The computing system composes a prompt including the text, at least a portion of the vehicle state, and an instruction set. The computing system submits the prompt to a machine learning model and receives a response to the prompt from the machine learning model, the response including a selected instruction from the instruction set. The computing system transmits the selected instruction to the vehicle.

title: Artificial Intelligence Management of Emergency Responders
abstract: The disclosed solution is generally configured for integration with a computer aided dispatch (“CAD”) system in order to analyze the mental and emotional health of law enforcement officers. The disclosed solution relies on artificial intelligence (“AI”) based on large-language models (“LLMs”) in order to process and categorize CAD-based data in order to detect opportunities to provide mental and emotional support for responding law enforcement who face difficult emergency situations. The disclosed solution is configured to operate with existing CAD systems in order to reduce reconfiguration and retraining of dispatchers.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED IMAGE ANALYSIS FOR DETECTION AND CHARACTERIZATION OF LESIONS
abstract: Presented herein are systems and methods that provide for improved detection and characterization of lesions within a subject via automated analysis of nuclear medicine images, such as positron emission tomography (PET) and single photon emission computed tomography (SPECT) images. In particular, in certain embodiments, the approaches described herein leverage artificial intelligence (AI) to detect regions of 3D nuclear medicine images corresponding to hotspots that represent potential cancerous lesions in the subject. The machine learning modules may be used not only to detect presence and locations of such regions within an image, but also to segment the region corresponding to the lesion and/or classify such hotspots based on the likelihood that they are indicative of a true, underlying cancerous lesion. This AI-based lesion detection, segmentation, and classification can provide a basis for further characterization of lesions, overall tumor burden, and estimation of disease severity and risk.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD TO ENHANCE AUDIO AND VIDEO MEDIA USING GENERATIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: A system and method enhance original media including a first audio using generative artificial intelligence, including large language models and media conversion modules. The system includes a graphic user interface including a media player and a display region for outputting an enhanced media including the original media, a summary of the original media, the plurality of chapter headings of the original media, and generated text constituting chapters. The media player plays the original media, and the display region displays the summary in a first display region, and displays the plurality of chapter headings and generated text constituting chapters in a second display region. The summary, the plurality of chapter headings, the chapters, and each of a translation into a selected language and a second audio generated from the summary and the plurality of chapter headings are automatically generated from the original media. The method implements the system.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE OVERLAY FOR ELECTRONIC RECORDS SYSTEMS
abstract: Aspects of the inventive concepts involve a system and a method that include or use an AI overlay that applies models to interpret content from an electronic health record (EHR) display and generate insights related to the displayed EHR. Healthcare practices access an EHR system comprising a plurality of patient EHRs. The practice also has access to an application linked to at least one secondary source of patient information, such as an accountable care organization (ACO) application. The AI overlay implements vision or image-based processing of a displayed patient EHR to generate the insights from the secondary source of patient information, such as a summary of relevant patient data created since the patient's last visit to the practice (e.g., payer claims, pharmacy and lab information, admission, discharge and transfer events), and to provide auxiliary information, such as potential diagnosis and/or suggested care actions, within the screen displaying the EHR.

title: OPTIMIZATION OF CONCRETE MIXES AND PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: An artificial intelligence (AI)-based system for optimizing economic, environmental, and technical performance of concrete mixes. The system may obtain concrete mix data from laboratory testing of trial concrete mixes and production concrete mixes. The system may also obtain results from experiments designed to determine the impact of variation in raw materials. An AI model may be trained using the concrete mix data, and the trained AI model may be used to determine an optimize concrete mix having specific chemical and mechanical properties, environmental impacts, and financial performance. The trained AI model may be used to certify concrete mixes, provide performance metrics of laboratories testing concrete mixes, analyze performance of the trial and production concrete mixes, determine environmental product declarations, and analyze raw materials in concrete mixes in addition to provisioning geographic information system (GIS) information.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-DRIVEN NEGOTIATOR
abstract: Embodiments include a computing system, computing device, computer-implemented method and non-transitory computer readable medium for executing an artificial intelligence-driver negotiator. Embodiments obtain an information corpus corresponding to a claim event involving a user, and upon obtaining the information corpus, embodiments execute an artificial intelligence negotiator using the information corpus to perform automated negotiation process with the user.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED SYSTEM FOR GENERATING A PATENT SPECIFICATION AND METHOD THEREOF
abstract: An artificial intelligence-based system and method for generating a patent specification are disclosed. The artificial intelligence-based system integrates a plurality of subsystems, including project management, multi-modal data acquisition, data extraction, data chunking, refined disclosure generation, illustration preparation, figure description generation, claim generation, and specification orchestration. The artificial intelligence-based system obtain multi-modal data, such as invention disclosures, and prior art references, is parsed into structured data chunks stored. A plurality of domain-specific generative AI agents retrieve and process relevant data chunks to iteratively produce refined invention disclosures, claims, and specification sections in jurisdiction-specific templates. The artificial intelligence-based system supports automated figure extraction, line drawing conversion, and contextual figure description mapping. Real-time preview, prompt-driven refinement, and amendment propagation ensure internal consistency between the claims, figures, and descriptions. The artificial intelligence-based system enhances accuracy, compliance, and efficiency in patent specification generation, eliminating manual integration between technical, legal, and illustrative content.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-DRIVEN NEGOTIATOR
abstract: A computing system can obtain an information corpus corresponding to a claim event involving a user. The system may then execute an artificial intelligence negotiator using the information corpus to perform automated negotiation process with the user.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED ANOMALY SEARCH IN ELECTRONIC RECORDS
abstract: In order to facilitate artificial intelligence-based anomaly detection in electronic records, systems and methods include establishing a computer-implemented clustering process based on record attributes (e.g., using a k-means algorithm) such that records are grouped into clusters and pairs of records within each cluster are subsequently analyzed; generating feature vectors by normalizing and concatenating selected attributes and filtering out vectors exhibiting low variance based on first predetermined parameters; applying an ensemble of at least three anomaly detection models (e.g., Local Outlier Factor, DBSCAN and another model) to cast votes on whether each pair is anomalous and flagging pairs that satisfy a second predetermined consensus threshold; and performing actions in response to flagged anomalies, including generating alerts or storing results with associated anomaly scores, whereby the system enhances detection accuracy and scalability for applications such as financial market analysis and other domains requiring robust data evaluation.

title: EVALUATING COMPUTATIONAL REASONING PERFORMANCE OF GENERATIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODELS
abstract: Systems and methods evaluate computational reasoning performance of generative artificial intelligence (GAI) models. Both a factual prompt and a counterfactual prompt are submitted to both first and second GAI models, thereby generating first factual and counterfactual outputs for the first GAI model and second factual and counterfactual outputs for the second GAI model. Probability of necessity (PN) and probability of sufficiency (PS) values are computed for both the first and second GAI models based on their associated factual output and counterfactual output. The computational reasoning performance of the first GAI model relative to the second GAI model are compared based on the PN and PS values. One of the first or the second GAI models is selected based on the comparison and submitted a target prompt using the selected one of the first and second GAI model.

title: SYSTEMS FOR AND METHODS OF CENTRAL PLANT OPTIMIZATION USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: A method for improving the operations of a central plant. Historical operational data of the plant is used to train various equipment models of the building. Using the equipment models optimization problems are generated for various operating conditions. Training data sets including the operating conditions and the respective solutions to the optimization problems are formed. An artificial intelligence model is trained to approximate the solutions to the optimization problem. The artificial intelligence model is used generate an operating point for current operating conditions and the operating point is used to control the equipment of the plant.

title: ANALOG SYSTEM FOR EDGE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE COMPUTING
abstract: An analog system for edge artificial intelligence computing includes a first plurality of analog edge devices configured to receive an input analog signal and to output a first plurality of output analog signals, a second plurality of analog edge devices configured to receive the first plurality of output analog signals and to output a second plurality of output analog signal, and one or more memory devices in communication with the first plurality of analog edge devices and the second plurality of analog edge devices, and configured to store weight parameters, the weight parameters being adjustable based on time constants of the first plurality of analog edge devices or the second plurality of analog devices, or both. The second plurality of output analog signals are multiplied by the weight parameters to obtain a plurality of weighted analog signals.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED PREDICTIVE ANALYTICS OF ELECTRONIC USER DATA
abstract: A system is provided for artificial intelligence based predictive analytics of electronic user data. In particular, the system may comprise an artificial intelligence (“AI”) engine that continuously aggregates user data associated with a user and/or a group of users based on internal and external data sources across various different communication channels. The AI engine may then parse and tokenize the user data to generate a complete user snapshot associated with the user and/or the group of users. Based on analyzing the user data, the AI engine may generate a probability score associated with a predicted user action within the network environment. Based on the predicted user action and the probability score associated with the predicted user action, the system may drive decisioning processes within the network environment and/or generate one or more outputs to be presented on one or more user computing devices in and out of the network environment.

title: AUTOMATED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PROMPTING AND INCIDENT SUMMARIZATION
abstract: Embodiments include a computing system, computing device, non-transitory computer readable medium, and computer-implemented method for automating artificial intelligence (AI) prompting and incident summarization. Embodiments provide for automatically generating AI prompts based at least in part on incident information, transmitting the AI prompts to a remote computing system on which a large language model (LLM) is implemented, and providing an AI summary of an incident.

title: AUTOMATED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PROMPTING AND INCIDENT SUMMARIZATION
abstract: A computing system can automatically generate artificial intelligence (AI) prompts based on incident information, transmit the AI prompts to a remote computing system implementing a large language model (LLM) and receive an AI summary of an incident.

title: Intelligent Optimization of Software Performance Through Generative Artificial Intelligence
abstract: Arrangements for optimizing software performance through generative artificial intelligence are provided. Execution data associated with a user interacting with an application programming interface through a user interface on a computing device may be received. Trace data based on the execution data may be generated. The trace data may indicate that a performance of an application is degraded. One or more performance prompts specifying program behavior may be generated. Application source code and the performance prompts may be sent to an artificial intelligence engine for performing key performance indicator driven code analysis. The one or more performance prompts may have been executed in the artificial intelligence engine for pretraining a large language model. Optimized source code may be received from the artificial intelligence engine. Performance testing may be executed on the optimized source code. An action may be performed to address the performance of the application.

title: ELECTRONIC SYSTEM FOR ERROR DETECTION AND REMEDIATION IN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE GENERATIVE ENGINES
abstract: The present invention relates to apparatuses, systems, methods and computer program products for error detection and remediation in artificial intelligence generative engines. The system typically is structured for network flow circuit arrangement with counter-processing engine components for localizing errors, detecting inaccurate basis in training data, and validating data generated in a distributed network. In some aspects, the system comprises a first artificial intelligence engine network structured for generating output data based on affirmative indicator processing, The system further comprises a second artificial intelligence engine network operatively connected to the first artificial intelligence engine network, wherein the second artificial intelligence engine network is structured to challenge the challenge the first artificial intelligence engine for error detection based on negative indicator processing. Upon identifying a defect, the system is structured to process remediation actions at the first artificial intelligence engine network.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHATBOTS FOR USE WITH ENERGY MANAGEMENT SYSTEMS
abstract: An apparatus for use with energy management systems is provided and comprises a user interface and a Chatbot in operable communication with the user interface for receiving a query and transmitting a response to the query and in operable communication with at least one of a large language model (LLM) tool/agent, a LLM service, customer service (CS) agent, or storage layer for developing the response to the query.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI)-BASED SERVICE PROVIDING METHOD AND DEVICE
applicants: BEIJING XIAOMI MOBILE SOFTWARE CO LTD [CN]
BEIJING XIAOMI MOBILE SOFTWARE CO., LTD
abstract: A method for providing a service based on AI is executed by a first AI network function (NF) network element with decision-making capability. The method includes: receiving a first request message sent by an AMF network element indicating an AI service requested by a terminal device; determining a data allocation result based on the first request message, in which the data allocation result includes: indication information corresponding to data allocated to a first AI NF network element and at least one second AI NF network element; sending the data allocation result to the NF network element, and receiving data allocated by the NF network element based on the data allocation result, and determining a first data execution result based on the data allocated by the NF network element, and receiving a second data execution result sent by the at least one second AI NF network element.

title: Composite-Structured Lightweight Semi-truck and tractor-Trailer Energy System with artificial Intelligence -Enabled Blockchain V2G, Range Extension, and Geo-Fenced Advertising

An onboard artificial intelligence (“AI”) engine optimizes energy flows, predicts vehicle and grid demand, and manages a blockchain-enabled smart-contract vehicle- to-grid (“V2G”) sell-back platform. title: MULTI-AGENT COMPUTER SOFTWARE FRAMEWORK FOR A CONVERSATIONAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM
abstract: Methods and systems are presented for providing an artificial intelligence (AI)-based conversation system for facilitating a conversation with users and processing transactions for the users. The AI-based conversation system includes an AI model coupled with different backend modules. Based on an utterance submitted by a user during a chat session, the AI model is configured to generate instructions for a backend module to perform a transaction for the user based on a prompt template. The AI model also communicates the instructions to the backend module using a protocol specified in the prompt template. Upon receiving an output from the backend module, the AI model is configured to generate content for the chat session based on the output, and provide the content to the user.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED DYNAMIC STUDY ENVIRONMENT
abstract: Systems and methods of presenting a study environment comprise and/or perform receiving, by an electronic processor, a context, wherein the context comprises an augmented content including a problem step pre-written by a first generative artificial intelligence (AI) model; presenting, by the electronic processor via a graphical user interface (GUI) of a user device, the problem step; receiving, by the electronic processor, an input responsive to the problem step from a user of the user device; presenting, by the electronic processor, a dynamic interaction to the user using a second generative AI model, wherein presenting the dynamic interaction includes: parsing, using the second generative AI model, the input, generating, by the second generative AI model, a response to the input, and causing the user device to display the response to the user.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED ELECTRONIC TEXTBOOK
abstract: Systems and methods of presenting an electronic textbook perform and/or comprise generating, by an electronic processor, a graphical user interface (GUI) for presenting an electronic textbook interface to a learner; initializing, by the electronic processor, an interactive session window within the electronic textbook interface; and via the electronic textbook interface: receiving, by the electronic processor, a user input via the GUI, determining, based on the user input, at least one of a request type and a request scope, in response to determining that the request type corresponds to a request for dynamic content: generating, using a generative artificial intelligence (AI) model and based on the request scope, the dynamic content, and presenting the dynamic content to the user via the GUI, and in response to determining that the request type corresponds to a request for pre-generated content, presenting the pre-generated content to the user via the GUI.

title: DISPOSITIF TERMINAL DESTINÉ À L'AMÉLIORATION DES PERFORMANCES DE TRANSFERT INTERCELLULAIRE AU MOYEN D'INTELLIGENCE ARTIFICIELLE (IA)/APPRENTISSAGE AUTOMATIQUE (ML), DISPOSITIF DE STATION DE BASE, ET PROCÉDÉ DE COMMANDE
abstract: This terminal device: measures the radio quality of a signal transmitted from a currently connected base station device, the radio quality acquired for the signal transmitted from the base station device being input to a trained model during a training phase; specifies one or more occurrence probabilities respectively corresponding to one or more timings of at least one of a radio link failure (RLF) or a handover failure (HOF), which are obtained by inputting the radio quality measured during an inference phase to the trained model, the trained model being obtained through machine learning using, as training data, a value indicating whether or not at least one of the RLF in the case of handover processing not having been performed or the HOF in the case of the handover processing having been executed at one or more timings after a predetermined period at the timing of acquisition of the radio quality, has occurred; and transmits predetermined information pertaining to the one or more occurrence probabilities to the base station device. L invention concerne un dispositif terminal qui : mesure la qualité radio d'un signal transmis à partir d'un dispositif de station de base actuellement connecté, la qualité radio acquise pour le signal transmis à partir du dispositif de station de base étant entrée dans un modèle entraîné pendant une phase d'entraînement ; spécifie une ou plusieurs probabilités d'occurrence correspondant respectivement à un ou plusieurs moments d'une défaillance de liaison radio (RLF) et/ou d'une défaillance de transfert intercellulaire (HOF), qui sont obtenues par entrée de la qualité radio mesurée pendant une phase d'inférence dans le modèle entraîné, le modèle entraîné étant obtenu par apprentissage automatique au moyen, en tant que données d'entraînement, d'une valeur indiquant si la RLF dans le cas de la non mise en œuvre d'un traitement de transfert intercellulaire et/ou une HOF dans le cas de l'exécution du traitement de transfert intercellulaire à un ou plusieurs moments après une période prédéterminée au moment de l'acquisition de la qualité radio, s'est produite ou ne s'est pas produite ; et transmet des informations prédéterminées concernant la ou les probabilités d'occurrence au dispositif de station de base. 端末装置は、接続中の基地局装置から送信された信号についての無線品質を測定し、学習フェーズにおいて基地局装置から送信された信号について取得された無線品質を入力とすると共にその無線品質が取得されたタイミングの所定期間後の１つ以上のタイミングにおいてハンドオーバ処理が行われなかった場合の無線リンク障害（ＲＬＦ）とハンドオーバ処理が実行された際のハンドオーバ障害（ＨＯＦ）との少なくともいずれかが発生したか否かを示す値を教師データとした機械学習によって取得された学習済みモデルに対して、推論フェーズにおいて測定された無線品質を入力することによって取得されたＲＬＦとＨＯＦとの少なくともいずれかの１つ以上のタイミングのそれぞれに対応する１つ以上の発生確率を特定し、１つ以上の発生確率に関する所定の情報を基地局装置へ送信する。

title: PROCÉDÉ ET APPAREIL DE POSITIONNEMENT BASÉ SUR L'INTELLIGENCE ARTIFICIELLE OU L'APPRENTISSAGE AUTOMATIQUE (IA/ML)
abstract: Methods and apparatuses for Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning (AI/ML)-based positioning are provided. The method includes receiving, from a network entity, Non-Access Stratum (NAS) signaling including at least one association identifier and a Positioning Reference Signal (PRS) configuration, performing, based on the PRS configuration, measurements to obtain at least one measurement result, labeling the at least one measurement result with the at least one association identifier, training an AI/ML model based on the at least one measurement result labeled with the at least one association identifier, and labeling the AI/ML model with the at least one association identifier. L'invention concerne des procédés et des appareils de positionnement basé sur l'intelligence artificielle ou l'apprentissage automatique (IA/ML). Le procédé comprend les étapes consistant à : recevoir, en provenance d'une entité de réseau, une signalisation de strate de non-accès (NAS) comprenant au moins un identifiant d'association et une configuration de signal de référence de positionnement (PRS) ; effectuer, sur la base de la configuration de PRS, des mesures pour obtenir au moins un résultat de mesure ; étiqueter l'au moins un résultat de mesure avec l'au moins un identifiant d'association ; entraîner un modèle AI/ML sur la base de l'au moins un résultat de mesure étiqueté avec l'au moins un identifiant d'association ; et étiqueter le modèle AI/ML avec l'au moins un identifiant d'association.

title: DISPOSITIF ÉLECTRONIQUE POUR ÉDITER UN CONTENU EN UTILISANT UN MODÈLE D'INTELLIGENCE ARTIFICIELLE GÉNÉRATIVE ET SON PROCÉDÉ DE FONCTIONNEMENT
abstract: According to an embodiment, an electronic device may comprise a display, at least one processor, and a memory for storing instructions. According to an embodiment, the instructions may, when executed by the at least one processor, cause the electronic device to, on the basis of identifying a command for editing first content displayed on the display, identify objects included in the first content. According to an embodiment, the instructions may, when executed by the at least one processor, cause the electronic device to, on the basis of attributes of the objects, identify functions for editing a corresponding object among the objects. According to an embodiment, the instructions may, when executed by the at least one processor, cause the electronic device to display, on the first content, a plurality of icons for editing the objects, wherein the shape of each of the plurality of icons is determined on the basis of an attribute of the corresponding object and the functions for editing the corresponding object. According to an embodiment, the instructions may, when executed by the at least one processor, cause the electronic device to, on the basis of a first user input for selecting a first icon from among the plurality of icons, display a first menu for editing a first object corresponding to the first icon, wherein the first menu includes sub-icons indicating functions for editing the first object on the basis of an attribute of the first object. According to an embodiment, the instructions may, when executed by the at least one processor, cause the electronic device to, when a first sub-icon is selected from among the sub-icons, identify a second user input for a control user interface (UI) provided by the first sub-icon. According to an embodiment, the instructions may, when executed by the at least one processor, cause the electronic device to, in response to the second user input, display second content in which the first object included in the first content has been changed on the basis of a function corresponding to the first sub-icon. Selon un mode de réalisation, un dispositif électronique peut comprendre un afficheur, au moins un processeur et une mémoire pour stocker des instructions. Selon un mode de réalisation, les instructions peuvent, lorsqu'elles sont exécutées par le ou les processeurs, amener le dispositif électronique à identifier, sur la base de l'identification d'une commande pour éditer un premier contenu affiché sur l'afficheur, des objets inclus dans le premier contenu. Selon un mode de réalisation, les instructions peuvent, lorsqu'elles sont exécutées par le ou les processeurs, amener le dispositif électronique à identifier, sur la base d'attributs des objets, des fonctions pour éditer un objet correspondant parmi les objets. Selon un mode de réalisation, les instructions peuvent, lorsqu'elles sont exécutées par le ou les processeurs, amener le dispositif électronique à afficher, sur le premier contenu, une pluralité d'icônes pour éditer les objets, la forme de chaque icône de la pluralité d'icônes étant déterminée sur la base d'un attribut de l'objet correspondant et des fonctions pour éditer l'objet correspondant. Selon un mode de réalisation, les instructions peuvent, lorsqu'elles sont exécutées par le ou les processeurs, amener le dispositif électronique à afficher, sur la base d'une première entrée d'utilisateur pour sélectionner une première icône parmi la pluralité d'icônes, un premier menu pour éditer un premier objet correspondant à la première icône, le premier menu comprenant des sous-icônes indiquant des fonctions pour éditer le premier objet sur la base d'un attribut du premier objet. Selon un mode de réalisation, les instructions peuvent, lorsqu'elles sont exécutées par le ou les processeurs, amener le dispositif électronique à identifier, lorsqu'une première sous-icône est sélectionnée parmi les sous-icônes, une seconde entrée d'utilisateur pour une interface utilisateur (UI) de commande fournie par la première sous-icône. Selon un mode de réalisation, les instructions peuvent, lorsqu'elles sont exécutées par le ou les processeurs, amener le dispositif électronique à afficher, en réponse à la seconde entrée d'utilisateur, un second contenu dans lequel le premier objet inclus dans le premier contenu a été modifié sur la base d'une fonction correspondant à la première sous-icône. 일 실시 예에 따르면, 전자 장치는 디스플레이, 적어도 하나의 프로세서, 및 인스트럭션들을 저장하는 메모리를 포함할 수 있다. 일 실시 예에 따르면, 상기 인스트럭션들은 상기 적어도 하나의 프로세서에 의해 실행 시, 상기 전자 장치로 하여금, 상기 디스플레이에 표시된 제1 컨텐트를 편집하는 명령을 확인하는 것에 기반하여, 상기 제1 컨텐트에 포함된 객체들을 확인하도록 할 수 있다. 일 실시 예에 따르면, 상기 인스트럭션들은 상기 적어도 하나의 프로세서에 의해 실행 시, 상기 전자 장치로 하여금, 상기 객체들의 속성들에 기반하여, 상기 객체들 중 해당하는 객체를 편집하기 위한 기능들을 확인하도록 할 수 있다. 일 실시 예에 따르면, 상기 인스트럭션들은 상기 적어도 하나의 프로세서에 의해 실행 시, 상기 전자 장치로 하여금, 상기 객체들을 편집하기 위한 복수의 아이콘들을 상기 제1 컨텐트 위에 표시하도록 할 수 있으며, 여기서 상기 복수의 아이콘들 각각의 모양은 상기 해당하는 객체의 속성 및 상기 해당하는 객체를 편집하는 상기 기능들에 기반하여 결정될 수 있다. 일 실시 예에 따르면, 상기 인스트럭션들은 상기 적어도 하나의 프로세서에 의해 실행 시, 상기 전자 장치로 하여금, 상기 복수의 아이콘들 중 제1 아이콘을 선택하는 제1 사용자 입력에 기반하여, 상기 제1 아이콘에 대응하는 제1 객체를 편집하기 위한 제1 메뉴를 표시하도록 할 수 있으며, 여기서 상기 제1 메뉴는 상기 제1 객체의 속성에 기반하여 상기 제1 객체를 편집하는 기능들을 나타내는 서브 아이콘들을 포함할 수 있다. 일 실시 예에 따르면, 상기 인스트럭션들은 상기 적어도 하나의 프로세서에 의해 실행 시, 상기 전자 장치로 하여금, 상기 서브 아이콘들 중 제1 서브 아이콘이 선택되면, 상기 제1 서브 아이콘에 의해 제공되는 제어 UI(user inferface)에 대한 제2 사용자 입력을 확인하도록 할 수 있다. 일 실시 예에 따르면, 상기 인스트럭션들은 상기 적어도 하나의 프로세서에 의해 실행 시, 상기 전자 장치로 하여금, 상기 제2 사용자 입력에 응답하여, 제1 서브 아이콘에 대응하는 기능에 기반하여 상기 제1 컨텐트에 포함된 상기 제1 객체가 변경된 제2 컨텐트를 표시하도록 할 수 있다.

title: SYSTÈMES ET PROCÉDÉS DE CERTIFICATION DE FICHIERS MULTIMÉDIA CRÉÉS SANS INTELLIGENCE ARTIFICIELLE GÉNÉRATIVE
abstract: Systems and methods disclosed herein provide the capability for certification of media files as being free of generative artificial intelligence (GAI) content. Via use of the systems and methods, consumers can elect to consume media that is free of GAI content. Les systèmes et les procédés divulgués fournissent la capacité de certification de fichiers multimédias comme étant exempts de contenu d'intelligence artificielle générative (GAI). Par l'utilisation des systèmes et des procédés, les consommateurs peuvent choisir de consommer des supports qui sont exempts de contenu GAI.

title: SYSTÈME ET PROCÉDÉS D'ENTRAÎNEMENT ET DE FONCTIONNEMENT POUR UN SYSTÈME D'INTELLIGENCE ARTIFICIELLE GÉNÉRAL DESTINÉ À LA GÉNÉRATION DE DONNÉES
abstract: Method and system adaptive artificial intelligence system for data model processing, comprising: a data input module configured to receive raw data; a preprocessing module to preprocess the raw data; a model training module configured to train a model using the preprocessed data, wherein the model training module comprises an adaptive learning engine configured to adjust training parameters based on performance metrics; an image restoration module configured to apply the trained data model to restore image data; and a final product generation module configured to produce a final product based on the restored image data. Système d'intelligence artificielle qui, lorsqu'il est entraîné sur des données d'échantillon, peut être utilisé pour générer ensuite des données de structure arbitraire, telles que des structures d'image, de géométrie, de musique ou de logique de décision, en se basant sur des règles et en respectant des statistiques. L'invention concerne un procédé d'entraînement du système sur des données d'échantillon, et un procédé d'utilisation du système pour la génération de données lors de la fourniture de données d'entrée supplémentaires. Les données produites sont générées par création d'un ensemble de valeurs valides associées à des probabilités statistiques et réduites à une valeur unique par une fonction de choix arbitraire. Le système et les procédés sont particulièrement utiles pour la génération basée sur des règles dans des environnements à ressources et données d'apprentissage restreintes nécessitant des solutions de génération dynamique conformes aux règles.

title: METHOD AND APPLICATION FOR FAST SHARING OF IMAGES BETWEEN MOBILE ELECTRONIC DEVICES USING AN INNOVATIVE PLATFORM AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: A method and system shares content quickly using artificial intelligence ("AI"). An electronic device having a display (101), a touch sensitive screen and a processor is utilized. Media content, such as an image, is captured using the camera (201) or screenshot functionality of the device. Using an AI system, the captured image is analyzed and, based on prior communications and patterns, suitable recipients, communication channels, and/or platforms are identified for sharing of the media content by the user. A sharing screen (330) is displayed having a plurality of selectable regions (205). The selectable regions are associated with different communication channel(s) and audience(s), including a recipient and associated communication channel (selected from among text, email, or mobile application communication channels) or a social media platform (20) of the user. Upon selection of the selectable regions, a message including the media content (200) is created and transmitted by the device. Un método y un sistema que comparten contenido rápidamente utilizando inteligencia artificial ("IA"). Se utiliza un dispositivo electrónico que tiene una pantalla (101), que incorpora una superficie sensible al tacto y un procesador. El contenido multimedia, como una imagen, se captura utilizando la cámara (201) o la función de captura de pantalla del dispositivo. Mediante un Sistema de Inteligencia Artificial, se analiza la imagen capturada y, con base en comunicaciones y patrones previos, se identifican los destinatarios, canales de comunicación y/o plataformas adecuados para que el usuario comparta el contenido multimedia. Se muestra una pantalla para compartir (330) con una pluralidad de regiones seleccionables (205). Las regiones seleccionables están asociadas a diferentes canales de comunicación y audiencias, incluyendo un destinatario y un canal de comunicación asociado (seleccionado entre texto, correo electrónico o canales de comunicación de aplicaciones móviles) o una plataforma de redes sociales (20) del usuario. Después de la selección de las regiones seleccionables, el dispositivo crea y transmite un mensaje que incluye el contenido multimedia (200).

title: MULTI-SELECTION SHUTTER CAMERA APPLICATION THAT SELECTIVELY SENDS IMAGES TO DIFFERENT ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PLATFORMS
abstract: A multi-selection shutter camera application and method selectively provides for sending content for fast sharing and informational purposes. An electronic device having a display (410) incorporating a touch sensitive surface (411) and a processor are utilized. The display (410) includes a multi-shutter view comprising at least one content block (120) and at least two selective capture buttons (110). Upon a user selection of a selective capture button initiates an AI platform to analyze the content through parameters (such as geolocation, time of capture, content of the photo) and generate a plurality of alternatives and options related to the selected capture button. Different options may include: Discovery functionality alternatives including applications, contacts, and/or media content; Shopping functionality alternatives including websites, applications, contacts, media content, and or information; and Sharing functionality alternatives including combinations and alternatives to easily share content with other users and/or social media platforms. Un método y aplicación de cámara con obturador de selección múltiple permiten enviar contenido de forma selectiva para compartirlo rápidamente y con fines informativos. Se utiliza un dispositivo electrónico con una pantalla (410) que incorpora una superficie sensible al tacto (411) y un procesador. La pantalla (410) incluye una vista con obturador de selección múltiple que comprende al menos un bloque de visualización en vivo (120) y al menos dos botones de captura selectiva (110). Cuando el usuario selecciona un botón de captura selectiva, se activa una plataforma de IA que analiza el contenido mediante parámetros (como la geolocalización, la hora de la captura o el contenido de la foto) y genera una serie de alternativas y opciones relacionadas con el botón de captura seleccionado. Las diferentes opciones pueden incluir: alternativas de funcionalidad de descubrimiento, incluyendo aplicaciones, contactos y/o contenido multimedia; alternativas de funcionalidad de compras, incluyendo sitios web, aplicaciones, contactos, contenido multimedia y/o información; y alternativas de funcionalidad para compartir, incluyendo combinaciones y alternativas para compartir fácilmente contenido con otros usuarios y/o plataformas de redes sociales.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR IDENTIFYING HUMAN REMAINS, BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND BLOCKCHAIN
abstract: The present invention relates to a system for identifying human residues and identifying the origin territory based on deep learning (deep learning) and blockchain by analysing phytolites present in the dental tartar (calculation). The process comprises: (i) obtaining the sample under chain of custody; (ii) preparation and separation of phytolites; (iii) data acquisition by Raman spectroscopy, optical micrograph/SEM/EDX, and calculation nanoindentation; (iv) extraction of features with geometrical morphometry (landmarks/Procrustes/PCA) and spectral and mechanical descriptors; (v) multimodal fusion and deep learning (CNN for sequential images and networks for spectra) to obtain probability of geographical origin; (vi) search in a vector index (top-k candidates) with confidence and explanatory calibration; and (vii) digital traceability by means of hash SHA 256 and anchor in blockchain, which guarantee integrity, auditing and chain of custody of the evidence. The system is non-invasive, robust to degradation when the DNA is insufficient, scalable, and interoperable with forensic databases. It incorporates privacy by design (sensitive data off chain, access control and bitacora), reducing false positives and strengthening the pericyal reliability. La presente invención se refiere a un sistema para la identificación de restos humanos y la identificación del territorio de origen basado en aprendizaje profundo (Deep Learning) y cadena de bloques (Blockchain) mediante el análisis de fitolitos presentes en el sarro dental (cálculo). El procedimiento comprende: (i) obtención de la muestra bajo cadena de custodia; (ii) preparación y separación de fitolitos; (iii) adquisición de datos mediante espectroscopía Raman, micrografía óptica/SEM/EDX y, nanoindentación del cálculo; (iv) extracción de características con morfometría geométrica (landmarks/Procrustes/PCA)y descriptores espectrales y mecánicos; (v) fusión multimodal y aprendizaje profundo (CNN para imágenes y redes secuenciales para espectros) para obtener probabilidad de origen geográfico; (vi) búsqueda en un índice vectorial (top-k candidatos) con calibración de confianza y explicabilidad; y (vii) trazabilidad digital mediante hash SHA 256 y anclaje en blockchain, que garantizan integridad, auditoría y cadena de custodia de la evidencia. El sistema es no invasivo, robusto ante degradación cuando el ADN es insuficiente, escalable e interoperable con bases de datos forenses. Incorpora privacidad por diseño (datos sensibles off chain, control de accesos y bitácora), reduciendo falsos positivos y fortaleciendo la confiabilidad pericial.

title: PROCÉDÉ D'ENTRAÎNEMENT DE MODÈLE D'INTELLIGENCE ARTIFICIELLE, SYSTÈME DE PUCE ET DISPOSITIF ASSOCIÉ
abstract: The present application provides an AI model training method, a chip, and a related device. The method comprises: a model training system acquiring a first matrix in the forward propagation stage of a model, and determining a scaling coefficient corresponding to each sub-matrix among a plurality of m * m sub-matrices comprised in the first matrix, wherein one scaling coefficient is used for converting data in the corresponding sub-matrix from a high-precision first data type to a low-precision second data type; then converting the first matrix into a second matrix on the basis of the scaling coefficient of each sub-matrix, and performing forward propagation of the model on the basis of the second matrix and the plurality of scaling coefficients; and in the backward propagation stage, performing backward propagation of the model on the basis of a transposed matrix of the second matrix and the plurality of scaling coefficients. When a transposed matrix of a low-precision matrix needs to be used to participate in computation, the low-precision matrix is directly transposed to obtain the transposed matrix to participate in computation, thereby reducing errors caused by conversion between high-precision data and low-precision data, and improving the accuracy of model training. La présente demande concerne un procédé d'entraînement de modèle d'IA, une puce et un dispositif associé. Le procédé comprend les étapes suivantes : un système d'entraînement de modèle acquiert une première matrice dans l'étage de propagation avant d'un modèle, et détermine un coefficient de mise à l'échelle correspondant à chaque sous-matrice d'une pluralité de m * m sous-matrices comprises dans la première matrice, un coefficient de mise à l'échelle étant utilisé pour convertir des données dans la sous-matrice correspondante d'un premier type de données de haute précision en un second type de données de faible précision ; puis convertir la première matrice en une seconde matrice sur la base du coefficient de mise à l'échelle de chaque sous-matrice, et effectuer une propagation vers l'avant du modèle sur la base de la seconde matrice et de la pluralité de coefficients de mise à l'échelle ; et dans l'étape de propagation vers l'arrière, effectuer une propagation vers l'arrière du modèle sur la base d'une matrice transposée de la seconde matrice et de la pluralité de coefficients de mise à l'échelle. Lorsqu'une matrice transposée d'une matrice de faible précision doit être utilisée pour participer au calcul, la matrice de faible précision est directement transposée pour obtenir la matrice transposée qui participe au calcul, ce qui permet de réduire les erreurs provoquées par la conversion entre des données de haute précision et des données de faible précision, et d'améliorer la précision de l'entraînement de modèle. 本申请提供一种AI模型的训练方法、芯片及相关设备，该方法包括：模型训练系统在模型的前向传播阶段获取第一矩阵，确定第一矩阵包括的多个m*m的子矩阵中每个子矩阵对应的缩放系数，其中，一个缩放系数用于将对应的子矩阵中的数据由精度高第一数据类型转换为精度低的第二数据类型；然后根据每个子矩阵的缩放系数将第一矩阵转换为第二矩阵，根据第二矩阵和多个缩放系数执行模型的前向传播；在反向传播阶段，根据第二矩阵的转置矩阵和上述多个缩放系数执行模型的反向传播。当需要使用一个低精度的矩阵的转置矩阵参与计算时，将低精度矩阵直接进行转置操作得到转置矩阵参与计算，能够降低高低精度数据之间转换带来的误差，提高模型训练的准确性。

title: PROCÉDÉ ET APPAREIL UTILISÉS DANS UN NŒUD POUR LA COMMUNICATION SANS FIL ET L'INTELLIGENCE ARTIFICIELLE
applicants: SHANGHAI TUILUO COMMUNICATION TECH PARTNERSHIP LIMITED PARTNERSHIP [CN]
上海推络通信科技合伙企业（有限合伙）
abstract: Disclosed in the present application are a method and apparatus used in a node for wireless communication and artificial intelligence. The method comprises: a first node receiving a first information block, which indicates a first resource block set; and sending a second information block, which indicates a first resource set from among the first resource block set, wherein the first resource set is used for dynamic scheduling. The first resource block set is determined on the basis of an AI/ML model; the first resource block set comprises K1 resource blocks, wherein K1 is a positive integer greater than 1, and time-domain resources occupied by at least two of the K1 resource blocks are orthogonal to each other; and the first resource block set depends on an ID of the AI/ML model. The present application realizes dynamic scheduling transmission triggered by a UE, improves the adaptability and intelligence level of a communication system, and supports a more flexible scheduling mechanism, thereby improving the performance, efficiency and user experience of the communication system. Sont divulgués dans la présente demande un procédé et un appareil utilisés dans un nœud pour la communication sans fil et l'intelligence artificielle. Le procédé comprend les étapes suivantes : un premier nœud reçoit un premier bloc d'informations, qui indique un premier ensemble de blocs de ressources ; et envoie un second bloc d'informations, qui indique un premier ensemble de ressources parmi le premier ensemble de blocs de ressources, le premier ensemble de ressources étant utilisé pour une planification dynamique. Le premier ensemble de blocs de ressources est déterminé sur la base d'un modèle AI/ML ; le premier ensemble de blocs de ressources comprend K1 blocs de ressources, K1 étant un nombre entier positif supérieur à 1, et des ressources de domaine temporel occupées par au moins deux des K1 blocs de ressources étant orthogonales les unes par rapport aux autres ; et le premier ensemble de blocs de ressources dépendant d'un ID du modèle AI/ML. La présente demande réalise une transmission de planification dynamique déclenchée par un UE, améliore l'adaptabilité et le niveau d'intelligence d'un système de communication, et prend en charge un mécanisme de planification plus flexible, ce qui permet d'améliorer les performances, l'efficacité et l'expérience d'utilisateur du système de communication. 本申请公开了一种被用于无线通信与人工智能的节点中的方法和装置。第一节点接收第一信息块，所述第一信息块指示第一资源块集合；发送第二信息块，所述第二信息块从所述第一资源块集合中指示第一资源集合，所述第一资源集合为了动态调度；所述第一资源块集合是基于AI/ML模型确定的；所述第一资源块集合包括K1个资源块，所述K1是大于1的正整数，所述K1个资源块中的至少两个资源块所占用的时域资源是正交的；所述第一资源块集合依赖所述AI/ML模型的ID。本申请实现UE触发的动态调度传输，提高通信系统适应性和智能化水平，支持更灵活的调度机制，进而提升通信系统的性能、效率和用户体验。

title: DISPOSITIF TERMINAL, DISPOSITIF DE STATION DE BASE ET PROCÉDÉ DE COMMANDE POUR AMÉLIORER LES PERFORMANCES DE TRANSFERT À L'AIDE DE L'INTELLIGENCE ARTIFICIELLE (IA) ET DE L'APPRENTISSAGE AUTOMATIQUE (ML)
